title: Product Code Scanner
description: Validate product codes used in a warehouse system. Valid codes start with two uppercase letters (category), followed by a dash, then exactly four digits (product number), another dash, and end with a single letter (version).
solutionSummary: This pattern validates structured product codes using exact quantifiers. `[A-Z]{2}` matches exactly two uppercase letters, `\d{4}` matches exactly four digits, and `[A-Z]` matches a single uppercase letter. The literal dashes separate each component, creating a rigid format validation.
